channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7400|2024-09-27T18:54:39.099Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: The vulnerability potentially allowed an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations during the removal of a detected file on the Windows operating system to delete files without having proper permissions to do so.

item.title: CVE-2024-6654|2024-09-27T08:54:28.250Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20cyber%20security
item.description: Products for macOS enables a user logged on to the system to perform a denial-of-service attack, which could be misused to disable the protection of the ESET security product and cause general system slow-down.

item.title: CVE-2024-2003|2024-08-01T18:56:22.634Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.
